articles.title: Congratulations to Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Congratulations to Raul Castro Ruz
Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il, together with Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Raul Castro Ruz, second secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, President of the Council of State and President of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, on his birthday.
					 The message said:
					
					 We extend warm congratulations and comradely salute to you on your birthday. 
					
					 We, availing ourselves of this opportunity, express belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the parties, governments and peoples of our two countries would steadily grow stronger in the joint struggle against imperialism and for socialism and sincerely wish you good health and happiness and greater success in your work.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Nigerien President
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Nigerien President
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by Nigerien President Mamadou Tandja.
					 The gift was conveyed to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, by Boubakar Adamou, Nigerien ambassador to the DPRK, Tuesday.

articles.title: Credentials of Nigerien Ambassador Accepted
articles.content:
Credentials of Nigerien Ambassador Accepted
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Nigerien Ambassador to the DPRK Boubakar Adamou at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
					 He talked with the ambassador after receiving the credentials.

articles.title: Meeting for Solidarity with Palestinian People Held
articles.content:
Meeting for Solidarity with Palestinian People Held
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- A meeting for solidarity with the Palestinian people took place at the DPRK-Palestine Friendship Oryu Cooperative Farm, Sadong District of Pyongyang, on Tuesday. 
					 Present there on invitation were Palestinian Ambassador to the DPRK Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan and his embassy officials. 
					
					 Present there were So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the DPRK-Palestine Friendship and Solidarity Committee, officials concerned and members of the farm. 
					
					 Speakers at the meeting strongly denounced Israel for perpetrating a large-scale military attack against Palestine and killing its civilians.
					
					 They extended full support and solidarity with the Palestinian people in their just cause to retake the territories occupied by Israel and regain the legitimate national rights including the right to self-determination, the right to return home and the right to found an independent state with Kuds as its capital.
					
					 A letter to the chief of the Palestinian National Authority was adopted at the meeting.  
					
					 On the same day embassy officials looked round the mosaic showing President Kim Il Sung talking to farmers, the monument to his on-the-spot guidance and buildings associated with revolutionary activities of members of the Mangyongdae family.
					
					 They helped farmers in weeding a maize field.

articles.title: Leader's Forced March Full of Patriotic Devotion
articles.content:
Leader's Forced March Full of Patriotic Devotion
Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- The leader of the DPRK continues forced march full of patriotic devotion not for his personal comfort and the happiness of his family but for the prosperity of the motherland and all blessings of the people.
					It was when General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited mines in Komdok area in South Hamgyong Province some days ago. He personally entered a pit of the Ryongyang Mine to acquaint himself with the work of putting the cutting on large-sized and modern basis and set forth the tasks to be carried out by the mine.
					
					 He has visited dozens of units to rouse the people to a leap forward since he kindled the torch of a new great revolutionary upsurge in Kangson in December last.
					
					 From the beginning of the year, he has given field-guidance to the Wonsan Youth Power Station in the eastern area, the Taean Heavy Machine Complex and the Kum Song Tractor Plant in the western area and various units of Pyongyang.
					
					 Making a round of the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex, he learned that its modernization depended upon an oxygen plant and said that he had to call at the Rakwon Machine Complex again. And he directly headed for Rakwon on the west coast about 400 kilometers away from the fertilizer complex.
					
					 The visit to Rakwon was followed by the 800km-long journey of field guidance to the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex, the Ranam Coal Mining Machine Complex and the Musan Ore Mining Complex on the east coast where he set a timetable for creation of innovations.
					
					 In those days he found himself on the way of field guidance without dropping in his home even a day.
					
					 His unprecedented forced march was followed by visits to Manpho, a border town in Jagang Province, the area at the foot of Mt. Paektu, Songrim, Tokchon, Jaeryong, Huichon, Anju, Kusong and other parts of the country.
					
					 He went on his march day and night by train and field jeep, covering high passes, steep mountain ridges and earth and icy roads.
					
					 His forced march full of patriotic devotion is bringing about signal successes and creation of new norms and new records in all sectors of the national economy in the DPRK.

articles.title: Each Day Counts
articles.content:
Each Day Counts
Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il summoned an official on February 16, Juche 71 (1982) and told the latter to accompany him to  the reconstruction and expansion site of the Moranbong Stadium (now Kim Il Sung Stadium). 
					The official was surprised to hear that as he had been anxious the leader should take a rest if but for a day, on the birthday he was meeting amid the deepest blessings of all the people.  
					
					As the official was at a loss what to do, he urged him to hurry up as there was no time to lose.
					
					Calming himself with much difficulty, the official said earnestly he should take a rest that day, postponing his going to the reconstruction site to the next day. 
					
					He said he could not put off the planned matter, even if he might defer his rest to the next day. He said each day counted as the project had to be completed at any cost by the seventieth birthday of President Kim Il Sung. "We are going to have the President at the Moranbong Stadium after rebuilding it on the highest level," he added.
					
					He said that the President would be greatly rejoiced to see it, that it was the happiest moment when he saw the President pleased.
					
					These were, indeed, meaningful words illustrative of the unshakable will of  Kim Jong Il with a great plan to erect more splendidly the Moranbong Stadium associated with the revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung and hand it down long in history.

articles.title: U.S. Double-Standards Policy on Nuclear Issue under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Double Standards Policy on Nuclear Issue under Fire
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- U.S. President Obama declared in the Czech Republic in last April that the United States would take the lead in making a "nuclear arms reduction" and "bringing about a world without nuclear weapons." During his trip to France made later he uttered he would pursue the goal of "working toward a world without nuclear weapons."
					 But when he was meeting former Japanese Prime Minister Abe, Obama claimed that the U.S. "nuclear disarmament should not be a hurdle in providing a nuclear umbrella to its allies." 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 As seen above, the U.S. is double-tongued and applies double standards as regards the nuclear issue.
					
					 The U.S. unreasonably brands the DPRK, Iran and other countries incurring its displeasure as "nuclear criminals" by taking issue even with their legitimate nuclear activities for peaceful purposes. But it shuts its eyes to the nuclear issues of the countries and forces that meekly obey and follow it and keep mum about them.
					
					 It is an open secret that the U.S. sent nuclear experts to Israel, its ally, to help Israel in its nuclear development and delivered highly enriched uranium to it and sold a lot of equipment for developing nuclear weapons to that country. In short, the U.S. is a conspirator and helper of Israel in its nuclear weaponization. The U.S. pretends not to know the fact that Israel has hundreds of nukes in place.
					
					 The U.S. also shuts its eyes to Japan's wild ambition to go nuclear.
					
					An international committee, describing Japan as "the only non-nuclear weapons state producing plutonium," disclosed that there is a factory capable of producing plutonium enough to produce 1,000 nuclear weapons every year by reprocessing spent nuclear fuel in Rokkasho in Aomori Prefecture, Japan.
					
					 This being a hard reality, the U.S. pretends to be ignorant of this fact for the mere reason that it is its junior ally. This clearly suggests that the U.S. loud-mouthed "world free from nuclear weapons" is nothing but sheer hypocrisy.
					
					 Now that the U.S. is keen to mount a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK and stifle it through the application of the above-said double standards the DPRK is left with no option but to bolster up its nuclear deterrent and take strong counter-measures.

articles.title: U.S. Supply of Military Equipment to S. Korea under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Supply of Military Equipment to S. Korea under Fire
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- The U.S. formally announced at the 22nd U.S.-south Korea meeting on policy initiative, held in Washington some time ago, that it decided to sell unmanned reconnaissance plane Global Hawk to the south Korean puppets.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday says in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 This shows that the U.S. is seeking to ignite a new war on the Korean Peninsula and expecting much of the south Korean puppets in doing so.
					
					 The aims sought by the U.S. at present are to destroy the basis of peace on the Korean Peninsula and create condition and circumstances for provoking a war of aggression on the DPRK by holding the absolute military strategic upper-hand over the DPRK's self-defensive war deterrent.
					
					 So, the U.S. is keen on strengthening the military alliance with the south Korean puppets.
					
					 What remains to be done is to drive the situation on the peninsula to the brink of war by extremely aggravating the inter-Korean relations. Recently the U.S. is getting on the nerves of the DPRK by having plugged the south Korean puppets into the PSI and intensifying the sanctions against the DPRK. This is an example of the said fact.
					
					 All the facts go to prove that the U.S. is a sworn enemy of the Korean nation which does not hesitate to bring catastrophe of a nuclear war to the Korean nation and its territory in a bid to realize its criminal ambition of domination.
					
					 Now that the U.S. is still persisting in the outdated military confrontation policy, there can be no other option but to strengthen the self-defensive war deterrent in every way so as to ensure peace and stabilize the situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK love and want peace but do not allow the aggressors' provocation.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppets should behave themselves if they do not want to meet the fate of tiger moth.

articles.title: KCNA Rebukes Japan's Poor Anti-DPRK Plot
articles.content:
KCNA Rebukes Japan's Poor Anti-DPRK Plot
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Recently the Japanese police authorities kicked up the racket of arresting a "person" suspected of "exporting equipment for a military use" to the DPRK.
					 They charged that the man tried to "illegally export a large vehicle which may be exclusively used as a ballistic missile launching pad to north Korea."
					
					 This does not deserve even a passing note as it is part of the anti-DPRK campaign launched according to the scenario of the Japanese reactionaries who frequently hatch plots against the DPRK.
					
					 Export or import of major equipment can never happen between the DPRK and Japan under the present level of the bilateral relations.
					
					 It is well known to everybody that the economic sanctions against the DPRK were part of the major contents of the hostile policy pursued by the Japanese reactionaries toward the DPRK for the past several decades.
					
					 Japan escalated economic blockade against the DPRK whenever the situation on the Korean Peninsula deteriorated.
					
					 Japan has taken the lead in "applying collective sanctions" against the DPRK, playing the role of a shock brigade in executing the U.S. policy to isolate and stifle it.
					
					 The Japanese authorities have long banned export banks from providing loans to the Japanese exporters who have business with the DPRK.
					
					 There are no elementary non-governmental trade, to say nothing of trade on the governmental-level and financial transaction between the DPRK and Japan.
					
					 A typical example of this is that Japan put total embargo on regular cargo-passenger liner Mangyongbong-92 from July 2006, terming it an "operational ship for abduction" and a "ship for illegal remittance". 
					
					 The fictitious story about "illegal export" spread by them under this situation cannot be interpreted otherwise than another anti-DPRK charade. 
					
					 It is nothing surprising that the Japanese reactionaries cooked up a new case as they have worked with bloodshot eyes to escalate the campaign against the DPRK while making far-fetched assertion that the satellite for peaceful purposes launched by the DPRK was a "ballistic missile".
					
					 The successive reactionaries of Japan have engrossed themselves in anti-DPRK hostile acts, leaving no means untried to meet their political interests out of inveterate enmity toward the DPRK.
					
					 It is absolutely ridiculous for the Japanese reactionaries to ride roughshod as if they had been waiting for the opportunity to present itself.
					
					 They are so keen on "missiles" that they kicked up such noisy "missile" racket.
					
					 This is, indeed, a mean and despicable demeanor aimed to secure a lever for putting "pressure" upon the DPRK.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are mistaken if they calculate they can get something through such mean farce.
					
					 The DPRK's cause of building a great prosperous and powerful nation is making dynamic progress despite the imperialists and the international reactionaries' increased political and military pressure, threat and blockade.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Prime Minister's Outbursts Flayed
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Prime Minister's Outbursts Flayed
Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Puppet Prime Minister of south Korea Han Sung Su, when meeting the Japanese prime minister during his recent junket to Japan, vociferated about "building of future-oriented and matured partnership".
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a signed commentary denounces this as a treacherous act of covering up the crimes of Japan, the sworn enemy of the Korean nation, and encouraging it in its moves for reinvasion. 
					
					 The commentary brands Han Sung Su as the dyed-in-the-wool servant of Lee Myung Bak obsessed with sycophancy toward the U.S. and Japan. 
					
					  The ulterior aim sought by him in begging the Japanese prime minister for "close cooperation in handling the north's missile and nuclear issues and so forth" is to intensify the international offensive for confrontation with fellow countrymen at any cost under the pretext of the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes and nuclear activities for self-defense and realize the Lee group's despicable ambition, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					That is why the group of traitors is persistently escalating its campaign against fellow countrymen in a bid to stifle the DPRK, unhesitatingly cooperating and siding with the Japanese reactionaries bitterly cursed and condemned by all Koreans.
					
					 The reality goes to clearly prove that it is the inveterate bad habit of the Lee group to stand in confrontation with fellow countrymen in conspiracy with outside forces and its ulterior intention is to do harm to the DPRK by relying on outside forces. 
					
					 The Lee group of traitors is sadly mistaken if it calculates it can gain something by unlimitedly escalating "sanctions" and "pressure" upon the DPRK through its cooperation with the Japanese reactionaries in the confrontation with the DPRK. 
					
					 The DPRK keeps all the crimes committed by the Lee group of traitors recorded in history and will surely force the group to pay a dear price for them.

articles.title: Bolstering of Self-Defence Capability Called for
articles.content:
Bolstering of Self-Defence Capability Called for
Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- The United States instigated the UNSC to adopt the brigandish "presidential statement" and then impose sanctions on the DPRK over its launch of satellite last April.  The UNSC has recently set in motion the sanctions, pursuant to the U.S. sinister scheme to suffocate the DPRK's defence industry and deter its bolstering of self-defence capability.
					 Recalling this fact, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a by-lined article that it is as foolish and futile an act as cutting blocks with a razor to attempt to frighten the DPRK with the stick called sanctions.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 A series of developments witnessed in the international arena in recent years show how important it is for each nation to build up the defence capability by its own efforts so as to stand in confrontation with imperialism.
					
					 To the imperialists, military muscle is a yardstick discriminating between the strong and the weak. They become diffident before the strong but outrageous before the weak.
					
					 The confrontation with the imperialists is just showdown. That is why each country and nation should build up their military muscle to win in the showdown with the imperialists and defend their sovereignty.
					
					 If each nation is not to stand on the defensive but take the initiative in the showdown with the imperialists, it should possess its military capability equipped with both powerful defensive and offensive means based on modern military technology.
					
					 Only possession of powerful offensive means makes it possible for each nation to contain any military attack by aggressors and emerge victorious. This is the lesson and truth drawn from the modern history of wars.
					
					 To the Korean people, self-defence capability just means their sovereignty and right to existence and fundamental guarantee for defending socialism.
					
					 We will further increase our military capability for self-defence to cope with the U.S. imperialists and their followers' more arrogant moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK.

articles.title: Anti-"Government" Struggle Unabated in South Korea
articles.content:
Anti-"Government" Struggle Unabated in South Korea
Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- According to CBS of south Korea, the Federation of Public Transport and Service Trade Unions, the Freight Workers' Solidarity and other labor movement organizations in south Korea and the Joint Action against the Suppression of Labor and for People's Right to Existence and Democracy in south Korea made up of the Solidarity for Progress, the Federation of University Student Councils and other organizations staged an anti-"government" struggle in Seoul on May 30.
					 The puppet police hurled riot policemen at dawn of that day to cordon off the square outside the Seoul city office expected to be the venue of a rally and the area around it. 
					
					 Enraged at the police's action, the organizations shifted the venue to the Deogsu Palace and Myongdong and other places and held meetings strongly demanding the group of traitors provide the freight transport workers with the right to existence and stop the crackdown upon the labor movement.
					
					 Then the organizations attempted to enter the square outside the city office after forming ranks of demonstrators for denouncing the Lee Myung Bak "government". 
					
					 The police resorted to brutal suppression of protesters, wounding many of them and walking off more than 70 people.

articles.title: DPRK's Nuclear Test Hailed by Different Countries
articles.content:
DPRK's Nuclear Test Hailed by Different Countries
Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Nine political parties and organizations of Mexico, including the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, the Mexican National Coordinating Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Mexican Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, released a joint statement on May 27 in celebration of the DPRK's second successful nuclear test.
					 The statement said the nuclear test was an admirable deed as it was intended to defend the supreme interests of the DPRK and the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of the nation under the condition that the U.S. imperialists have been getting evermore pronounced in their nuclear threat and moves to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 It expressed the expectation that the successful nuclear test would be conducive to defending the sovereignty of the country and the nation and socialism and ensuring peace and security of the Korean Peninsula and areas surrounding it with the might of Songun, an invincible treasured sword.
					
					 It called upon all political parties, governments and organizations in the world to resolutely foil the anti-DPRK moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers and render strong support and encouragement to the Workers' Party of Korea and the government and the people of the DPRK in their struggle to protect the national sovereignty and socialism.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist) in its statement issued on May 28 said that the DPRK has bolstered up its self-defensive military muscle to protect the sovereignty of the country and its socialist system by successfully conducting the second nuclear test.
					
					 Noting that the nuclear test conducted by the DPRK is one of the ways for defeating the imperialist aggression and ensuring peace on the Korean Peninsula at present, the statement stressed that the world peace-loving people should fully support the measures taken by the DPRK to defend peace.

articles.title: Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Works Held in Different Countries
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Works Held in Different Countries
Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Seminars on works of General Secretary Kim Jong Il took place in Democratic Congo, Guinea and Mongolia between May 25 and 26 on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of the start of his work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					Nzemba Yangana, chairman of the Youth Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Democratic Congo, briefed on the main content of Kim Jong Il's work "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential for Accomplishing Socialism" and referred to its significance.
					
					He noted that penetrating deep into the importance of the ideological work in the revolution and construction, Kim Jong Il paid primary attention to this work and authored many works stressing the need to give priority to it from the very days of his start of work at the WPK Central Committee.
					
					Explaining the main content of Kim Jong Il's work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction", Camano Vitor, chairman of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Conakry, Guinea, said that this work is enjoying ardent support and sympathy from the peoples of those countries struggling for independence for its scientific accuracy and truth while displaying its great vitality.
					
					A department director of the Literary College of Mongolia who is permanent member of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea at the college reviewed the main content of the said work and stressed that it is very important at present to frustrate the moves of the imperialists and other reactionary forces and preserve the Juche character and national character of the revolution and construction.

articles.title: Lecture on Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Given in Japan
articles.content:
Lecture on Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Given in Japan
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- A lecture of Koreans in Japan was given in Tokyo on May 27 on the occasion of the 9th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration under the sponsorship of the Association for the Peaceful Reunification of the Country.
					 It was attended by Koreans in Japan and south Korean students studying in Japan.
					
					 Kang Jong Hon, representative of the "Institute for South Korean Studies," said in a lecture that the inter-Korean relations which had favorably developed as the days go by thanks to the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration have now reached the worst phase due to the hostile policy toward the DPRK pursued by the Lee Myung Bak "government," ignoring the said declarations and refusing to implement them under the pretext of the "lost decade."
					
					 He assailed the Lee "government" for not only advocating "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars" for the purpose of pressurizing the north, regarding cooperation with foreign forces more important than national cooperation, but bringing the inter-Korean relations back to those in the past era of confrontation while calling for "unification under the liberal democratic system."
					
					 In order to improve the south-north relations it is necessary to take practical measures for developing cooperation and exchange with the north, he noted, adding:
					
					 Taking issue with the north's underground nuclear test, the U.S. and its followers are resorting to the moves to apply sanctions against it. This situation can be settled only through dialogue and negotiation based on the fair stand.
					
					 The struggle to put an end to the history of colonial domination and national division alone can guarantee the life and rights of the Koreans in Japan, he stressed, calling on the Koreans to actively turn out in the work to carve out the future of a reunified country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il felicita el cumpleanos de Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il felicita el cumpleanos de Raul Castro Ruz
						
 Pyongyang, 2 de junio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, junto con el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 2 un mensaje de felicitacion a Raul Castro Ruz, Segundo Secretario del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba y Presidente de los Consejos de Estado y de Ministros de la Republica de Cuba, por el dia de su nacimiento.
					 La misiva senala como sigue:
					
					 Con motivo de su cumpleanos, le enviamos nuestras calidas felicitaciones y saludo camaraderil.
					
					  Aprovechando esta oportunidad, expresamos la conviccion de que las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los partidos, los gobiernos y los pueblos de nuestros dos paises se ampliaran y se desarrollaran constantemente en la lucha comun contra el imperialismo y por el socialismo y formulamos sinceros votos por la buena salud y felicidad de usted y mayores exitos en su trabajo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia funcion de esposas de oficiales del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia funcion de esposas de oficiales del EPC
Pyongyang, 2 de junio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio la funcion de los grupos artisticos de las esposas de oficiales de la Unidad No.529 y la comandancia de las fuerzas navales del EPC quienes participan en el segundo concurso del segundo periodo de los grupos de ese tipo del EPC.
					 Se presentaron en la ocasion las piezas artisticas de diferentes generos tales como la recitacion de poesia "Oh, la lluvia de fuegos artificiales de la gran potencia prospera", el cuarteto vocal "Cuco en el camino al frente", el tambor y cancion "Marchemos a todo galope hacia la gran potencia prospera".
					
					En este espectaculo las ejecutantes cantaron en tono patetico la digna vida de si mismas que viven y trabajan muy orgullosas de servir como soldados cocineras de la Comandancia Suprema.
					
					Igualmente, manifestaron patentemente la invariable conviccion y voluntad de defender a costa de la vida a la Direccion de la Revolucion en la misma trinchera de sus esposos, quienes se levantaron en la batalla de defensa a ultranza de la patria, y de lograr sin falta la victoria final de la revolucion coreana.
					
					El Comandante Supremo se mostro muy satisfecho de que ellas ofrecieron esa funcion magnifica y recta en lo politico, que da respuestas a los problemas sociopoliticos de la epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar), y aprecio mucho los exitos alcanzados por ellas en la ocasion.
					
					Senalando que todas las piezas presentadas en el espectaculo son las obras de gran valor cognoscitivo y educacional que a traves de las vivencias esenciales y significativas, dan soluciones profundas en lo ideo-artistico y apegadas a la realidad a los importantes problemas surgidos en la lucha y la vida de los hombres de la epoca del Songun, elogio altamente la magnifica creacion e interpretacion de esas originales obras.
					
					Reconocio los meritos de las esposas de los militares destacando que ellas son revolucionarias adorables y fidedignas que ayudan con sinceridad el trabajo revolucionario de sus esposos, quienes estan empunando los fusiles, dedicando todo lo suyo no para la simple felicidad de su familia sino para la prosperidad de la patria.
					
					Le acompanaron el primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, general de ejercito Kim Jong Gak, los generales de ejercito del EPC, Hyon Chol Hae, Ri Myong Su y Kim Won Hong, el coronel general del EPC Han Tong Gun y otros miembros directivos del ejercito, el secretario del Comite Central del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, Choe Ik Gyu y Kim Yang Gon, y otros cuadros directivos del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica norma de doble rasero de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica norma de doble rasero de EE.UU. 
						
Pyongyang, 2 de junio (ATCC) -- El presidente norteamericano, Obama, declaro en abril pasado en Checo que su pais estara al frente de la "desarme nuclear" y "construira un mundo libre de armas nucleares". Despues, en Francia volvio a decir que presentara la meta para la "construccion de un mundo exento de las armas nucleares".
					  Sin embargo, en una entrevista con el ex premier japones Abe hablo de que aunque se realizara el "desarme nuclear", EE.UU. no pondra el obstaculo en el ofrecimiento de paraguas nuclear a los paises aliados".
					
					  El imperio dice las palabras contradictorias en el problema nuclear y aplica la norma de accion doble, senala asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual divulgado este martes y continua:
					
					  EE.UU. cuestiona hasta las actividades nucleares legales y pacificas de Corea, Iran y otros  paises que no le agradan, les tilda arbitrariamente de "delincuentes nucleares", pero, hace vistas gordas y no dice ni un pio sobre el problema nuclear de los paises y las fuerzas que le obedecen docilmente.
					
					  Para ayudar a su aliado Israel en el desarrollo nuclear, EE.UU. envio a este pais a los especialistas en esta rama, le entrego el uranio altamente enriquecido y le vendio numerosas instalaciones para el desarrollo de armas nucleares, lo cual es secreto publicado. En una palabra, el imperio es el complice y cooperante en el armamento nuclear de Israel. Aunque EE.UU. sabe bien que Israel tiene centenares de armas nucleares, esta en muda.
					
					  Por otra parte, el pais norteamericano hace una vista gorga sobre la ambicion nuclear del Japon. Un Comite Internacional insistio en que Japon es el "unico pais desprovisto de armas nucleares que produce el plutonio" y revelo que en la Rokkasho del departamento de Aomori, Japon se encuentra una fabrica capaz de producir el plutonio necesario a retratar los combustibles nucleares ya usados y fabricar anualmente mil armas nucleares.
					
					  Pero, EE.UU. actua como ciego ante la conducta del Japon que es su aliado inferior.
					
					  Lo dicho demuestra bien que la fanfarronada de EE.UU. de construir un "mundo sin armas nucleares" no pasa de ser una enganosa llena de hipocresia.
					
					  Puesto que EE.UU. recurre freneticamente al ataque nuclear anticipado contra la RPDC y las maniobras de aplastarla aplicandole la muy injusta norma de doble rasero, la RPDC fortalecera la fuerza disuasiva nuclear para hacer rotundamente frente al respecto.

articles.title: ATCC comenta nuevo complot anti-RPDC de reaccionarios japoneses
articles.content:
ATCC comenta nuevo complot anti-RPDC de reaccionarios japoneses
Pyongyang, 2 de junio (ATCC) -- Hace poco, las autoridades policiacas de Japon arrestaron al "sospechoso" que supuestamente trataba de "exportar los equipos de uso militar" a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					  Especificamente, ellas insisten en que el arrestado planeaba "exportar ilicitamente al Norte de Corea el camion de gran tamano convertible en la plataforma de lanzamiento de misiles balisticos".
					
					  Esta opinion insignificante forma parte de la campana intrigante anti-RPDC que suelen lanzar los reaccionarios japoneses cada vez que la necesiten.
					
					  En la situacion actual de las relaciones Corea-Japon, es imposible el intercambio de los importantes equipos entre los dos paises.
					
					  Todos saben que la sancion economica es uno de los pilares de la politica hostil a la RPDC que practican los reaccionarios japoneses durante varios decenios.
					
					  Japon hizo mas ferreo el bloque economico a la RPDC cada vez que se agravaba la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y se puso al frente de la "sancion colectiva" siendo la vanguardia en la maniobra de EE.UU. para acorralar y aplastar a aquella.
					
					  Ya hace mucho tiempo que las autoridades japonesas desautorizaron el prestamo de los bancos de exportacion a los comerciantes japoneses que se dedicaban a la exportacion a la RPDC.
					
					  Entre la RPDC y Japon no hay el intercambio comercial y financiero del nivel gubernamental ni del civil.
					
					  Por ejemplo, Japon prohibio totalmente desde julio de 2006 la entrada del barco trasbordador regular de carga y pasajeros "Mangyongbong-92" calificandolo de "nave para las operaciones de secuestro y remesas ilicitas".
					
					 Bajo estas circunstancias, el rumor de la "exportacion ilicita", que circulan los japoneses, no pasa de ser otro complot anti-RPDC.
					
					 Esto no es nada novedoso si se tiene en cuenta que ellos hostilizan tanto a la RPDC describiendo absurdamente el lanzamiento de satelite artificial con fines pacificos como el de "misil balistico".
					
					 Historicamente, era un vicio cronico de ellos vetar a la RPDC y hostilizarla a favor de sus intereses politicos utilizando todos los medios y metodos.
					
					 Es muy ridiculo que los reaccionarios japoneses alucinados por el "misil" armaran contra la RPDC otro alboroto relacionado con ese artefacto.
					
					 Esta sucia y pueril conducta tiene por su objetivo buscar otro espacio de "presion" a la RPDC.
					
					 Estarian muy equivocados si ellos creen que podrian alcanzar algo inventando con bajeza los incidentes con que quieren perjudicar a la RPDC.
					
					  A pesar de la creciente presion y amenaza politico-militares y el bloqueo de los imperialistas y otros reaccionarios internacionales, avanza al ritmo acelerado la causa de construccion de una gran potencia prospera de la RPDC.
